headline: Verano Strengthens National Product Portfolio in Industry’s Fastest-Growing Category with Launch of Swift Lifts as Standalone Pre-roll Brand
summary: Swift Lifts feature premium, perfectly portioned cannabis pre-rolls crafted for those who value quality and convenience CHICAGO, Jan. 14, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Verano Holdings Corp. (Cboe CA: VRNO) (OTCQX: VRNO) (“Verano” or the “Company”), a leading multi-state cannabis company, today announced the launch of Swift Lifts as an independent brand, offering a robust line-up of premium pre-roll offerings that are perfectly portioned and designed to deliver quality and convenience.
